text: "Heeding the Call" is a song by HammerFall. It was released as their second single on August 3, 1998. == Track listing == # "Heeding the Call" (Dronjak/Cans) – 4:24 # "Eternal Dark" (Dronjak/Cans) – 3:08 # "The Metal Age (live)" (Dronjak) – 4:28 # "Steel Meets Steel (live)" (Dronjak/Cans) – 4:34 # "Stone Cold (live)" (Dronjak/Cans) – 7:02 == Personnel == * Joacim Cans - Lead & Backing Vocals * Oscar Dronjak - Guitars & Backing Vocals * Stefan Elmgren - Guitars & Backing Vocals * Magnus Rosén - Bass * Patrik Räfling - Drums Category:Power metal Category:HammerFall songs Category:1998 songs
title: Heeding the Call
